EmailTemplate.name: BIC Xtra-Value Packs
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot - BIC® Xtra-Value Packs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
BIC Xtra-Value Packs are the best way to buy BIC and save up to 49%! They offer great value and are ideal for schools, offices and anywhere a large volume is needed. Available in:
BIC® Brite Liner® Highlighter 200c BIC® Xtra Smooth Mechanical Pencil 320c BIC® Marking™ Permanent Marker 200ct BIC® Great Erase® Dry Erase Marker 175ct
There are no inner packs. See the attached flyer to learn more.
Warmest Regards,
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
{!User.Email}
(855)DEPOT11 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
